constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 152 (Tuesday, August 31, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. LEE of Nevada:
H.R. 5141.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 provides Congress with the
power to ``lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and
Excises'' in order to ``provide for the . . . general Welfare
of the United States.''
[Page H4501]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 384.

title: Maximizing Outcomes through Better Investments in Lifesaving Equipment for (MOBILE) Health Care Act
